post_title: FS (All sold)  - Several T206's - Cycle, Piedmont, Sov's and Tolstoi
post_content:
For Sale - A nice mix of tougher to find backs and a couple of Piedmonts.  Prices include shipping, please message if interested and thanks for looking.  Note: NC residents please add 6.75% to any agreed upon price to cover ST.

T206 Jack White Cycle 350 - SGC 3  Sold

T206 Chief Bender Portrait P150 - SGC 2  Sold

T206 Doc Crandall Portrait with Cap, Tolstoi - SGC 4  Sold

T206 Doc Crandall Portrait No Cap, P150 - SGC 4  Sold

T206 Jack Knight with Bat, Sovereign 350 - SGC 5  Sold

T206 Billy Sullivan Portrait, Sovereign 350 - SGC 4  SOLD
Bump for price reduction on remaining card.
